When you tap on PLAY, the countdown to the game will begin When the countdown ends, a 9-square gameboard will appear & the first song of the game will start Tap on the song name that you think is playing Tho only way to advance to the next playlist is to beat the challenge score. How well do you know your tunes?
// powerups The hint powerup highlights 3 options on the board with 1 of them being the correct one The freeze powerup pauses the song timer while still allowing tho song to play. Get a higher score with a shorter time! Tho skip powerup lets you pass the current song, with the ability to come back to it later. Maybe it'll be clearer what it is at the end of the round The replay poweup gives you another chance to hear the song Tho longer clip powerup adds on an extra 10 seconds to the song, giving you more to guess on The facebook powerup is FREE and lets you reach out to friends for help. Maybe they'll know the answer for you to move on! The next playlist powerup allows you to move on to the next playlist without having to conquer tho score to beat.
Good World Games os a pioneer of the Gaming for good movement. We allow playes to make a difference while having fun. We partner with non-profits to support causes through our games.

 Games in and of themselves are great, but games that also do good are awesome. We had the crazy idea that maybe games are more than about having fun and entrtaining your brain for a few minutes here, a few hours there.

 What if games can change the way people behave in their lives? What if, through the power of games, we can leverage our collective wealth, intelligance, and energy to help solve hard problems? Join our movement!
